pr_title: [Backport stable/0.25] Fixes outdated topology when no new leader is assigned

timeline.bodyText: Topology does not have partition health in this version. You can remove this test.
timeline.author: deepthidevaki

replies.bodyText: I'm surprised the cherry pick included this test as well, I don't think I had added it as part of the original PR? 🤔
replies.author: npepinpe

replies.bodyText: I have also seen that behavior before. This https://stackoverflow.com/a/19001323 explains it. I did not expect this semantics of cherry-pick.
replies.author: deepthidevaki

timeline.message:
fix(gateway): fix outdated leader when no other leader

- fixes an issue in the gateway topology when the old leader becomes
  follower, and no new node is elected leader yet, by removing the new
  follower if it's still identified as the leader

chore(test-util): update definition of complete topology

- TopologyAssert#isComplete now also checks that all partitions have a
  leader
chore(qa): add topology fault tolerance tests
